name: KNOT Niskin Bottles
description: Hydrographic measuremenst at the Kyodo North Pacific Ocean Time-series station (KNOT). The scientific focus of the program at KNOT is the seasonal carbon cycle.

location.name: KNOT
location.description: Western north Pacific Ocean subtropical gyre

funder: Core Research for Evaluational Science and Technology (CREST) Program

subjectOf.description: Waikita et al. (2012) Dissolved inorganic carbon, total alkalinity, temperature, salinity and other variables collected via time series monitoring from BOSEI MARU NO. 2, HAKUREI MARU and others in the North Pacific Ocean from 1992-06-23 to 2012-12-31

provider.legalName: Japan Agency for Marine-Earth Science and Technology
provider.name: JAMSTEC

provider.legalName: NOAA NESDIS National Centers for Environmental Information
provider.name: NCEI

subevent.name: HO92-2, HO95-2, HO97-3

potentialAction.name: Determination of bottle salinity
result: Practical salinity of the water body

potentialAction.name: Determination of phosphate
object: Carrier solution: Low nutrient sea water (LNSW)

potentialAction.name: Determination of silicate
object: Carrier solution: Low nutrient sea water (LNSW)
